Summary: System doesn't auto resequences the codes in the Prof CPT/HCPCS grid if preference 'Resequence CPT by Total Facility RVU' is checked

Steps to reproduce.1: Log in TEC as user with ProFee license
Steps to reproduce.2: Settings → Facilities → tested facility → Configure → IP → check ''Resequence CPT by Total Facility RVU' preference
Steps to reproduce.3: Create IP encounter for tested facility AD=DD=current date, fill in all required fields, add DX I10, J18.9, K50.00
Steps to reproduce.4: Add 5 CPT codes with different 'Total Facility RVU' to Professional CPT/HCPCS grid (e.x. TBD 11950, 34490, 31500, 76705, 93010)

Expected result: System automatically resequences the codes in the CPT/HCPCS Procedures grid in descending order based on the values in the “Total Facility RVU” column (highest first)
Actual result: System does not automatically resequences the codes in the CPT/HCPCS Procedures grid in descending order based on the values in the “Total Facility RVU” column (highest first).
